attributes.action: abolish the Welsh Assembly and instate a Rainbow Coalition Party consisting of the Zippy, George and Bungle Party along with the Sooty and Sweep Alliance for the good and benefit of the Welsh people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does anyone really know either in Wales or the rest of the Country what is happening in Welsh Politics?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
